title: Understanding Volume Calculation
text: To find the volume of a rectangular pool, use the formula: length times width times depth.

title: Calculate the Volume
text: Given the pool dimensions: $$length=10m$$, $$width=5m$$, $$depth=2m$$, calculate the volume using the formula: $$volume=length width depth$$.

title: Simplifying the Calculation
text: Multiply the numbers: $$10\times5\times2$$ to find the volume.
